message.content:
Subject: Important Personal Announcement - My Departure from [Company Name]

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to share some important personal news with you, which is that I have decided to leave [Company Name]. After much contemplation and careful consideration of my future plans, I have accepted a new position at another organization where I believe I can grow professionally and personally in ways that align better with my long-term goals.

I want to express my sincere gratitude for the opportunities and experiences I've had while working at [Company Name]. It has been an enriching journey full of challenges, learnings, and accomplishments. The team we have built together has been nothing short of remarkable. I am grateful for your support, guidance, and mentorship throughout these years.

In order to ensure a smooth transition, I would like to offer my assistance in finding a suitable replacement or providing any necessary training to ease the handover process. Please let me know how I can help in this regard. My last day at [Company Name] will be [Last Day], and I will do everything possible to ensure all outstanding tasks are completed before then.

Moving forward, please feel free to reach out if you need any information or assistance related to my work. Rest assured, I am committed to making this transition as seamless as possible for the team and the company.

Once again, thank you for everything. Working with such a supportive and passionate team has been a privilege, and although it's sad to say goodbye, I look forward to staying in touch and learning about [Company Name]'s future endeavors.

Best regards,

[Your Full Name]
[Your Current Position]
[Contact Information]
